component.name: MarkupGridExample
component.script:
sub init() m.top.translation = [ 130, 160 ]
m.markupgrid = m.top.findNode("exampleMarkupGrid")
m.readMarkupGridTask = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentReader") m.readMarkupGridTask.contenturi = "http://www.sdktestinglab.com/Tutorial/content/rendergrid.xml" m.readMarkupGridTask.observeField("content", "showmarkupgrid") m.readMarkupGridTask.control = "RUN" end sub
sub showmarkupgrid() m.markupgrid.content = m.readMarkupGridTask.content end sub
